Whenever you cast a blue spell, choose up to X, where X is the number of blue mana symbols in that spell's mana cost–
• Whenever target creature deals combat damage to a player this turn, you draw a card.
• Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
• Copy target spell with mana value 1 or less. You may choose new targets for the copy.
• Scry 2.
